Intercepted messages share an RSA modulus factor due to recycled primes. Crack the system to reveal the secret: ciphertext1: 3234324345138158624178811801157847264934708703572352647660801009767345361328246324647370380284439669430721579099295734102696011567139127647483046983091551, ciphertext2: 4825524221352504554826171776321827223406295082045771797730448189773277614433961847061689651492596980696260273549081924064703815789941937029400333852571188

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=9735240595200307134220049271488594919113800371116348560484347279731827926586238467784176953221942925269228271578162415674251327628025662252463014412226863, n2=10376172782832813203422909346437904789473678986360021855972629535862627811004901730252547282162425654010773024748334609542071817636332888835202388138803303, e=2044619195582485583784797834162127021901316145548076638812047150601666755432061665145227561889439618423427476294340654757989302716799593954995288886995499

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{tunxpf45}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 3234324345138158624178811801157847264934708703572352647660801009767345361328246324647370380284439669430721579099295734102696011567139127647483046983091551, ciphertext2: 4825524221352504554826171776321827223406295082045771797730448189773277614433961847061689651492596980696260273549081924064703815789941937029400333852571188
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=9735240595200307134220049271488594919113800371116348560484347279731827926586238467784176953221942925269228271578162415674251327628025662252463014412226863, n2=10376172782832813203422909346437904789473678986360021855972629535862627811004901730252547282162425654010773024748334609542071817636332888835202388138803303, e=2044619195582485583784797834162127021901316145548076638812047150601666755432061665145227561889439618423427476294340654757989302716799593954995288886995499
extra_info: p=103578069431509445344099527760193438008054320668810948796874203986720185517659, q=93989399963065475645553280543008668950654890052187238483781767692945240301757, r=110397265935417012033047345500773492339989257689804881100081895932515386798579, φ(n1)=9735240595200307134220049271488594919113800371116348560484347279731827926586040900314782378300953272460925069471203706463530329440745006280783348986407448, φ(n2)=10376172782832813203422909346437904789473678986360021855972629535862627811004697343586648799674747053384729242587043965394329825516749025171576927511702968
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
